column6: The past isn't what it used to be... as the Guardians are about to find out at great cost! Even with allies like Star-Lord and the last Nova at their side, can the Guardians meet their greatest challenge ever.... not just guarding the galaxy, but saving the Universe? Time-twisting cosmic action and mind-blowing SF adventure!
column8: | writer:Dan Abnett | penciller (cover):Alex Ross | artist:Gerardo Sandoval
